item.title: HOT FIX for Host Disconnections, Achievements, Game Names
item.description:
OI, quick one 'ere

  • Fixed issue with hosts being disconnected for seemingly no reason

  • Fixed issue with certain achievements not popping (Roamin' Ded Far, Da Best Krumpa, etc)

  • Stopped showing a user's PC name as default game name if they didn't change it

  • Fixed issue with a capture point race not showing properly in Burna Valley

  • Some networking improvements

K, back ta krumpin'

item.title: Hotfix 1.4.0.195 is live!
item.description:
Our tech-priests worked day and night to prepare another hotfix, Lord Captain!

Praise the Omnissiah, more errors were eliminated.

Please be aware of the plot spoilers below!

Note that https://steamcommunity.com/app/2186680/discussions/0/4027970580228219058/ always contains up-to-date information on known issues and the roadmap of upcoming patches.

Patch Notes:

  • Saves with the issues described in the hotfix 1.4.0.190 (arena in Commorragh and the Lord Captain remaining in a different form after Thassera) are now retroactively fixed;
  • The game could crash when entering Plundered Void Station if you already visited it before the DLC2 patch - fixed;
  • Fixed a number of visual issues with Chinese fonts;
  • Fixed desyncs in co-op related to the hologram of the familiar in combat;
  • Sometimes characters could move beyond the boundaries of the map on the Feudal World, walking through a wall - fixed;
  • Improved the elevator cutscene on the Feudal World;
  • Improved effect for the wall explosion on the Feudal World;
  • White color scheme was added for the Cyber-Eagle familiar;
  • A few broken dialogue options in Lex Imperialis were fixed and will now work correctly;
  • Cyber-Eagle abilities could remain after a respec when another familiar was chosen;
  • The Cyber-Eagle is now consistently returning to soaring above the battlefield at the end of its Overseer's turn;
  • Rite of Solar Nourishment now correctly grants +5 Agility to the Psyber-Raven;
  • The Psyber-Raven's Warp Buffer talent now works as intended, reallocating the Perils of Warp to the enemies. Behold the Unsanctioned Psyker!
  • The Psyber-Raven's Psy-Resonator talent now correctly regenerates +1 AP to the Overseer;
  • Servo-skull swarm Symbiosis talent now correctly regenerates +1 AP to the Overseer;
  • Fixed non-responsive controller buttons on the character screen;
  • Polishing updates to some portraits;
  • Sister Argenta can finally receive her Adepta Sororitas helmet that was seen in the trailers, but was lost during the original game release:



  • Beautiful flame effects were added to the Martyr shield and Last Stand shield:
